required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Neutralizing Antibody Level After COVID-19 Vaccination
clinical_study.official_title: Neutralizing Antibody Level After COVID-19 Vaccination in Hospital Works.

brief_summary.textblock:
1. serial of neutralizing antibody at 2, 4, 6, 9, 12 month after COVID-19 vaccination
2. investigate the factors on antibody titer.

detailed_description.textblock:
1. serial of neutralizing antibody at 2, 4, 6, 9, 12 month after COVID-19 vaccination 1) semi-quantitative measurement of neutralizing antibody at 2, 4, 6, 9, 12 month after COVID-19 vaccination 2) investigate the duration maintaining acceptable range (over 30% inhibition)
2. investigate the factors on antibody titer at 2 month after vaccination 1) potential factors: age, sex, body weight, height, use of medication, use of antipyretics (NSAID or tyrenol), side effect of COVID-19 vaccination 2) correlation between antibody titer and potential factors
3. Compare 4 diagnostic ELISA kit at 2 month after vaccination 1) measure neutralizung antibody using ELISA kits from 4 different companies 2) investigate correlation coefficient of antibody titer between companies

primary_outcome.measure: titer of neutralizing antibody after COVID-19 vaccination
primary_outcome.description: semi-quantitative measurement of neutralizing antibody after COVID-19 vaccination

correlation between antibody titer and body weight: spearmann's correlation
correlation between antibody titer and body weight: spearmann's correlation

primary_outcome.measure: Compare 4 diagnostic ELISA kit after COVID-19 vaccination
primary_outcome.description: measure neutralizung antibody using ELISA kits from 4 different companies 2 months after COVID-19 vaccination investigate correlation coefficient of antibody titer between companies

intervention.description: This study enrolled persons already who received COVID-19 vaccination under government policy. We collect 5mL blood at 2, 4, 6, 9, 12 months after COVID-19 vaccination isolate serum and store in -80 degree deep freezer measure neutralizing Antibody

biospec_descr.textblock:
1. 5mL blood at 2, 4, 6, 9, 12 months after COVID-19 vaccination.
2. centrifuge and get serum sample
3. store at -80 degree deep freezer until use

study_pop.textblock:
healthcare works aged 20-60 years after completion of COVID-19 vaccination
participants have no serious disease.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- healthcare works after completion of COVID-19 vaccination
- 20-60 years
- sign the agreement of study
Exclusion Criteria:
- serious underlying diseases
